00047 void LoadAndDisplayIMPText( INT16 sStartX, INT16 sStartY, INT16 sLineLength, INT16 sIMPTextRecordNumber, UINT32 uiFont, UINT8 ubColor, BOOLEAN fShadow, UINT32 uiFlags)
00048 {
00049       // this procedure will load and display to the screen starting at postion X, Y relative to the start of the laptop screen
00050       // it will access record sIMPTextRecordNumber and go until all records following it but before the next IMP record are displayed in font uiFont
00051   CHAR16 sString[ 1024 ];
00052   INT32 iCounter =0;
00053   BOOLEAN fNotDonePrintingFlag = TRUE;
00054   INT32 iRecordPosition = 0;
00055 
00056       if( fShadow == FALSE )
00057       {
00058             // don't want shadow, remove it
00059             SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
00060       }
00061 
00062    // load the string
00063       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile("BINARYDATA\\IMPText.EDT", sString, ( UINT32 ) ( ( sIMPTextRecordNumber ) * IMP_SEEK_AMOUNT ), IMP_SEEK_AMOUNT);
00064     
00065       // null put last char
00066       sString[ wcslen( sString) ] = 0;
00067 
00068       
00069       if( uiFlags == 0 )
00070       {
00071             uiFlags = LEFT_JUSTIFIED;
00072       }
00073 
00074   DisplayWrappedString( sStartX, ( INT16 )( sStartY  ), sLineLength, 2, uiFont, ubColor, sString, FONT_BLACK,FALSE, uiFlags);
00075 
00076 
00077       // reset shadow
00078       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00079 
00080 
00081 }

00293 
00294 
00295 void PrintIMPPersonalityQuizQuestionAndAnsers( void )
00296 {
00297  
00298       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00299   INT32 iOffset = 0; 
00300 
00301       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion < 0 )
00302       {
00303             return;
00304       }
00305 
00306       // how far into text is the question?
00307       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion; iCounter++ )
00308       {
00309             // incrment until question is found
00310             iOffset +=iIMPQuestionLengths[ iCounter ];
00311       }
00312   
00313       // handle any female specifc questions 
00314       if( fCharacterIsMale == FALSE )
00315       {
00316             OffSetQuestionForFemaleSpecificQuestions( &iOffset );
00317       }
00318 
00319       // how many answers are there?
00320   switch( iIMPQuestionLengths[ giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion ])
00321       {
00322         case ( 5 ):
00323                   // 4 answers, write down the side, extra wide columns
00324       
00325                   // question is at IMP_QUESTION_1 + iOffset
00326                   // and there are 4 answers afterwards
00327       BltAnswerIndents( 4 );
00328                   LoadAndDisplayIMPText( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 20, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 30, ( 460 ), ( INT16 )( IMP_QUESTION_1 + iOffset ), FONT10ARIAL, FONT_WHITE, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00329       
00330 
00331                   // answers
00332                   LoadAndDisplayIMPText( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + QTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 100, ( 390 ), ( INT16 )( IMP_QUESTION_1 + iOffset + 1), FONT10ARIAL, 142, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00333                   LoadAndDisplayIMPText( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + QTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 150, ( 390 ), ( INT16 )( IMP_QUESTION_1 + iOffset + 2), FONT10ARIAL, 142, TRUE, 0);

00398 
00399 void OffSetQuestionForFemaleSpecificQuestions( INT32 *iCurrentOffset )
00400 {
00401       INT32 iExtraOffSet = 0;
00402       BOOLEAN fOffSet = TRUE;
00403       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00404 
00405       // find the extra
00406       switch( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion )
00407       {
00408             case( 0 ):
00409                   iExtraOffSet = 0;
00410                   break;
00411             case( 3 ):
00412                   iExtraOffSet = iIMPQuestionLengths[ 0 ];
00413                   break;
00414             case( 8 ):
00415                   iExtraOffSet = iIMPQuestionLengths[ 0 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 3 ]; 
00416                   break;
00417             case( 9 ):
00418                   iExtraOffSet = iIMPQuestionLengths[ 0 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 3 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 8 ]; 
00419                   break;
00420             case( 13 ):
00421                   iExtraOffSet = iIMPQuestionLengths[ 0 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 3 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 8 ] + iIMPQuestionLengths[ 9 ]; 
00422                   break;
00423             default:
00424                   fOffSet = FALSE;
00425                   break;
00426       }
00427 
00428       if( fOffSet )
00429       {
00430             *iCurrentOffset = IMP_CON_3 - ( IMP_QUESTION_1 - 3 );
00431             
00432             *iCurrentOffset += iExtraOffSet;
00433 
00434       }
00435 }
